original_title: BIG BOSA Bamablapitiya appoints Ranjan Ramanayake as their Brand Ambassador
original_body_lines: Big Bosa last week announced that film director and superstar Ranjan Ramanayake has been officially declared as Big Bosa’s brand ambassador. Big Bosa’s objective is to spread awareness on how and why maintaining your health and following healthy fitness goals is important and how exercising will not only help you pursue your body and fitness goals but also help you feel good in your skin and save you from the risks of diseases like cholesterol, diabetes, heart attacks and even several types of cancer.

Big Bosa is ready to introduce you, high-quality fitness equipment ranging from treadmills, recumbent bikes, yoga mats, dumbbells, upright bikes, home gyms, Olympic bars, cross trainers, leg press, smith machines, rowing machines, air bikes, steppers, hand grips, bone dumbbells, track and field equipment from renowned brands such as Concept 2, Spirit Fitness, Body Solid, Jog Way and Polanik.

The two-story, spacious showroom with the presence of many helpful and skillful staff equipped to provide you with the necessary information on how you can maintain your health and be fit. With an updated website you can visit on www.bigbosa.com and guaranteed repairs for any of our equipment, free of charge deliveries island-wide and simple payment methods allow you to expose yourself to the luxuries of a fit and healthy lifestyle faster.
